title: The Stigma of Travel Destinations: Demystifying the World
description: There are some places that will get you funny looks when you mention your travel plans there. But why? In this episode, we demystify travel to unexpected and controversial places and share advice for those wanting to get off the beaten track.
itunes:title: The Stigma of Travel Destinations: Demystifying the World
itunes:subtitle: There are some places that will get you funny looks when you mention your travel plans there. But why?
author: Podcast@expedia.com (Expedia)
